unnormalised: Lol, my chacha-ji always introduces himself as "Ex-Subedar Major R.K. Sharma, at your service!" even when we're just ordering chai at a roadside dhaba. I swear, sometimes I think he outranks the chaiwala!
normalised: Laugh out loud, my chacha-ji always introduces himself as "Ex-Subedar Major R.K. Sharma, at your service!" even when we're just ordering chai at a roadside dhaba. I swear, sometimes I think he outranks the chaiwala!
